A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Take everything you love about Star Wars.  Now replace the carefully crafted\, uplifting story with nauseating political messages\, omissions\, disappointments\, and just plain nonsense.  Throw in the debasement of beloved (male) characters\, and you have an apt description of the Last Jedi.  Rian Johnson and crew have ruined Star Wars with a haughty\, postmodern\, SJW midle-finger.  Enjoy.
